titleStmt.title: A declaration or proffer of the Archdukes of Brabant concerning a truce betweene them and the States of the Free vnited Netherlandish Prouinces, tending to the treatie for a perpetuall peace betweene them: or for a surceasance of armes for certaine yeares. Contained in a letter sent vnto the said states. Also the ansvver and acceptance of the states of the vnited prouinces vnto the arch-dukes. Translated out of Netherlandish printed copie.
titleStmt.author: United Provinces of the Netherlands. Staten Generaal.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. R[aworth] for William Ferebrand, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: The Yale copy has A3,4 inserted from STC 5492.2 with dedication to the Earl of Exeter.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.
